title: J.H eSports Recruitment
body:
Looking for players to join a 7 man roster. Gold 3 plus in solo Q rank is a must. Must also have mic.

We have our own TS3 server and Coach. Looking to build a core group of players for season 6. All positions open at this stage. 

Leave a comment if you're interested or add me , IGN - Hooked.

Cheers boys/girls, and remember.. Up Up Cronulla

replies.body: no 1 come ere this guy just lies and bullshts you i ask him when trials would be and he fukin lied when he already made the team hes a fraud and an assholee so no1 come here to join this team because he will just get rid of you and ignore until he sees a higher rank

Best thing to do is to practice, its cliche but its true. I personally suck at CSing and hate it when I miss a cannon, its why I support and Jungle, means I don't have to focus so much on CSing and I get for farm not minions but enemy champions {{champion:412}} {{summoner:11}}

Hey man, i'd be interested in playing in this team with you
I'm happy to play whatever.
Rank: Plat 5, nothing amazing i know but keen to improve

IGN: Mr Spook

Add me my ign is "skt1 DEMONSLAYER" I main mid and can play a lot of champs! My rank is plat 5 

I am keen to fit anywhere on the team! I have had past experiences with gold 1 and plat 1 teams! I have teamspeak and got a mic! Really keen to improve while playing for your team! Looking forward for you to add me =).
Plat 4 adc hit me up if you want me
